name: DeathSmilers
description:
Like a 2D Mad Action Packed Mad Max Racer. Escape the Casino Clown Club in a post-apocalyptic Las Vegas. You can also create your own level. You're own train to zoom in and out of. 

"HOLY $#!T !!! THIS IS AWESOME! Great concept, excellent graphics, pumped up bgm, super responsive controls. I love it!"
-  radHABiT

Las Vegas, 2019. With civilization gone it was inevitable that the Casino Clown Club would control the territory. You have taken your dog back, but your junk car is leaking fuel. Only the gasoline train supply line can save you now.

Level creator added. Create your own train. If you want your friends to try your train just copy and paste 1 line. Will you make it easy or almost impossible?

UPDATES:

  • Re-Branded Art Style.
  • New Music
  • Added dust trail from the car.
  • Green karts explode into a dust cloud. 
  • Start and ending story.
  • Create your own level.
